reviewText: True legend has some epic fight scenes with heartbreak
Bought this for my son in law, he likes these kind of movies.

Not much of a storyline, nor plots.
But what summer fun!!!

Leave your brain out and just bring some bear and popcorn and enjoy the kung-fu actions.

What I was looking for....but I got mine in 2 BD back to back instead of 2 BD disc in a common sleeve

4/5
Great movies...Love them both.  They need to make some more
